summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TON City Builder authentication system. All 12 backend API tests passed. All 5 frontend UI tests passed. Authentication flows (registration, login with email, login with username, wrong password error handling) work correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Google OAuth is configured but requires valid GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID in backend/.env - currently placeholder value
TonConnect wallet integration is present but requires real wallet for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Authentication system fully tested and working. Test user credentials: email=test_p0_fix@example.com, password=test123, username=testuser_p0. All auth endpoints (/api/auth/register, /api/auth/login, /api/auth/me) working correctly. Google OAuth and TonConnect are integrated but require real credentials/wallet for testing.

features_tested.registration_email_password_username: PASSED - New users can register with email/password/username
features_tested.login_with_email: PASSED - Users can login with email and password
features_tested.login_with_username: PASSED - Users can login with username instead of email
features_tested.wrong_password_error: PASSED - Shows user-friendly error 'Неверные данные для входа' instead of technical error
features_tested.sidebar_after_login: PASSED - Sidebar appears on left side after successful login
features_tested.avatar_nickname_display: PASSED - User avatar and nickname appear in top right corner after login
features_tested.start_building_to_city_button: PASSED - Button changes from 'START BUILDING' to 'TO CITY' after authentication
features_tested.api_auth_me: PASSED - Returns user data with valid token, 401 without token
